name: academic-paper-qa
description: Validate and fix data accuracy issues, structural problems, and LaTeX compilation errors in academic papers
author: Micah Villmow
triggers: paper contains quantitative claims that need verification
LaTeX compilation fails with Unicode or table errors
building arXiv submission package from source
figures show no variance but are still included
build warnings about missing sections or alignment
converting Markdown tables to LaTeX format

outcomes.final_output: 33-page PDF with clean arXiv submission (34 pages, 663 KB)
